title: BREAKING: DHS Plan to Police “Disinformation” Exposed
itunes:title: BREAKING: DHS Plan to Police “Disinformation” Exposed
description: A newly leaked document reveals a shocking attempt by the U.S. Department of Homeland Security to quell free speech. Facebook and Twitter developed special portals for government agencies in a coordinated effort to silence individuals they disagree with. Jordan, Logan, and the Sekulow team break down this leak and more today on Sekulow.
content:encoded: A newly leaked document reveals a shocking attempt by the U.S. Department of Homeland Security to quell free speech. Facebook and Twitter developed special portals for government agencies in a coordinated effort to silence individuals they disagree with. Jordan, Logan, and the Sekulow team break down this leak and more today on Sekulow.
